selectBrand.title: Select the brand
selectBrand.p: Browse by swiping to pick the brand you own and continue with the setup process.

selectProduct.title: Select the product
selectProduct.p: Browse the products by swiping, choose yours, and move on to the next step.

search.title: Searching for new products
search.p: Searching for new products nearby. This will only take a moment, no action needed.

deviceFound.p: Select the product you own from the options below, then confirm your selection.

binding.title: Confirm the connection
binding.p: Press the blinking blue control button on your product to confirm your connection.

success.title: Successfully paired
success.p: Your product is successfully paired! Tap the button below to go to it and start using it.

notFound.title: No new products found
notFound.p: If you’re experiencing issues, follow these steps.

bullets.1: Be sure your mobile device’s bluetooth is turned on
bullets.2: Unplug the battery from your garment
bullets.3: Plug the battery back to your garment
bullets.4: Short press to control button on the heated product

notFound.paragraph: If the problem persists, tap the support button below to get assistance.

renameGarment.label: Rename the product
renameGarment.title: Rename your product
renameGarment.p: Type a name for your product. You can change it anytime.

deleteGarment.label: Forgot this product
deleteGarment.title: Delete {{productName}}
deleteGarment.p: This action will delete the device pemanently.
